comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: How to test without a wallet or something that creates an ecosystem? There is nothing on the website, the links mostly lead to a "coming soon" page. Has anyone used Testnet?

comments.author: Ms_Mining
comments.body: Quote from: r_victory on January 14, 2024, 06:45:06 PMHow to test without a wallet or something that creates an ecosystem? There is nothing on the website, the links mostly lead to a "coming soon" page. Has anyone used Testnet?It's EVM. Use a metamask for testnet or mainnet.

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: Quote from: Ms_Mining on January 14, 2024, 07:06:56 PMIt's EVM. Use a metamask for testnet or mainnet.OK thanks. I'll test it, I read that it was an EVM, but, as I saw that the website mentions the wallet, explorer, NFTs, I thought it could be used without needing Metamask or another resource.

comments.author: larissanetwork
comments.body: Hello Bitcoin Forum Community,We are thrilled to announce that Larissa (LRS), the innovative cryptocurrency of the Larissa Blockchain, is now listed and trading on two major exchanges: Xeggex.com and financex.trade! This is an exciting development for our growing community and potential investors.Available Trading Pairs:On Xeggex, you can trade Larissa with the following pairs:LRS/USDT - https://xeggex.com/market/LRS_USDT LRS/BNB - https://xeggex.com/market/LRS_BNBOn FinanceX, Larissa is available with these pairs:LRS/USDT - https://financex.trade/trading/lrsusdtLRS/BNB - https://financex.trade/trading/lrsbnbAbout Larissa Blockchain:Larissa Blockchain is designed for efficiency and scalability, with a focus on user-friendly experiences. Our blockchain supports innovative features like LRSNode, a rewarding mechanism for network participation, and Silo, an S3 compatible decentralized storage solution.Join the Larissa Community:This listing is a testament to our ongoing commitment to accessibility and market presence. We invite you to join our community, trade LRS, and be part of our journey in revolutionizing the blockchain space.Stay tuned for more updates and happy trading!

comments.author: r_victory
comments.body: It's a good start to attract investors and users. In addition to these listings, what are the marketing and publicity plans?
